articles.author: Olalekan Adigun
articles.title: Malaria Prevention: WHO's Second Vaccine Approval - BNN Breaking
articles.description: As summer nears, the importance of malaria prevention in Sub-Saharan Africa is heightened. The WHO-approved R21 Matrix M vaccine presents a significant advancement in malaria prevention.
articles.content: Sub-Saharan Africa is known for its high rates of malaria, a life-threatening disease transmitted by mosquitoes. This parasitic illness, caused by the Plasmodium parasite, claims approximately 400,00… [+2454 chars]
